headline: Are Textron's (TXT) Autothrottle Upgrades a Subtle Shift in Its Light-Jet Competitive Playbook?
summary: Textron Aviation has now brought the Cessna Citation M2 Gen2 equipped with Garmin Autothrottles into service following FAA certification in October 2025, adding automation and precision to what it calls its most delivered light-entry jet. This upgrade highlights Textron’s focus on avionics and aftermarket-backed reliability, a combination that can be important for operators evaluating light-jet fleet decisions. We’ll now examine how the new Garmin Autothrottles on Textron’s Cessna Citation...
